original: intros net vc cc. apply lift_prop. intros net' Hreach. apply one_leader_per_term_invariant. apply simulation_1. apply refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset with (P:=one_leader_per_term). - intros. rewrite reghost_deghost_partial_inverses. auto. - intros. intros h h'. rewrite FunctionalExtensionality.functional_extensionality. reflexivity. - intros. intros p. rewrite map_in_iff. intro H'. specialize (Hreach p). destruct H' as [x [Hin Hmap]]. destruct (deghost_packet_eq p x) as [Heq |_]. + inversion Heq. auto. + contradiction. - apply ghost_simulation_2. intros. rewrite reghost_deghost_partial_inverses. apply vc in Hreach. destruct Hreach as [Hone_vote _]. eapply cronies_correct_invariant in cc. destruct cc as [_ [Hcronies_votes _]]. apply Hone_vote. apply Hcronies_votes. apply trivial_reachable.
